game.title: The Enchanted Sword Quest
game.objective: Find and purify the corrupted sword from the Shadow Temple
game.description: A dark force has awoken the ancient artifact, the Sword of Shadows. It seeks to disrupt the balance between light and darkness. Your mission is to journey to the Shadow Temple, confront the guardian, and restore the sword's true power.

task.objective: Enter the Shadow Temple via the hidden entrance
task.description: The temple's entrance is camouflaged. Gather ancient scrolls to reveal its location and avoid traps.

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the guarded chamber
task.description: A puzzle guards the next chamber. Unravel its enigma to proceed further.

task.objective: Defeat Seraphim, the guardian of the sword
task.description: The Seraphim awaits you with its dark energy. Use your courage and the sword to defeat it.
